details.title: Analysis of linear time varying systems via haar wavelet
details.abstract: In this paper rear wavelet integral operational matrices are introduced and then applied to analyse linear time varying systems. The method converts the original problem to solving algebraic equations algebraic equations. Hence, computational difficulties fficulties are considerably Based rediced. Based on the property of time frequency localization of Haar wavelet bases, the solution of a system includes both the frequency information and the time information. Other orthogonal functions do not have this property. An example is given, and the results are shown to be very accurate.
